info.author: Ram Rachum
info.description:
PythonTurtle strives to provide the lowest-threshold way to learn (or teach) 
Python. Students command an interactive Python shell (similar to the IDLE 
development environment) and use Python functions to move a turtle displayed on 
the screen. An illustrated help screen introduces the student to the basics of 
Python programming while demonstrating how to move the turtle.

PythonTurtle was created by Ram Rachum as a side-project in 2009. I also provide `freelance Django/Python development services <https://chipmunkdev.com>`_.
info.name: PythonTurtle
info.summary: A learning environment for Python suitable for beginners and children, inspired by Logo.
